presentationColumns.name: Receipt Distribution Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the receipt and application distribution amount.

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Amount

presentationColumns.name: Avg Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Receipts Amount / Receipts Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Avg Receipts Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Discounts Taken of Applied Receipts %

presentationColumns.name: Earned Discounts of Total Discount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Earned Discounts Amount / Discounts Taken Amount) * 100.
